Author: bootload
Content:
"... i would love to see a way to pump all this discussion on hacker news into disqus ..."

This quote resonates a lot. Especially after reading Stowe Boyds` response "Fred Wilson on Leaving The Instigator Out: Small Worlds v Big World" on exactly this problem ~ http://www.stoweboyd.com/message/2008/05/a-vc-web-discus.htm...

Author: jauco
Content: If you want to say plus 1, you should just vote on the comment instead of making a new post. It's both nicer to the author and it reduces the noise in the thread.

Author: Tichy
Title: Ask HN: how did you fix problems with bad sleep?
Content: I am exhausted most of the time, because I never sleep well. Doctor diagnosed "restless legs syndrome" and wants to give me pills, but I wonder if there are any other things to try? Just interested in any stories of how people fixed their problems with bad sleep.
